turns.content: This is Walter, who's this?
Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm in a bit of trouble and need your help.

Oh hello there, this isn't how I expected to hear from you. Can you tell me what number this is coming from? I want to make sure we're really talking. Could you give me some time to call you back on the number I have for you?

It's okay Grandpa, no need for that. This is a blocked number out of respect for your privacy. Look, I'm in a rush here and can't wait much longer. You know how sensitive these situations are. Can you just help me quickly? I owe the IRS some money and they're about to arrest me unless I pay it now. Please, Grandpa, this is serious. I need you to buy a couple of Walmart gift cards for $4850 and give them to me over the phone. It has to be done within the hour or else-

Wait just a moment, son. This sounds very odd and urgent. Why don't we go through more official means? Can you tell me your full name so I can verify this with the IRS myself? Also, please give me that number, even if it's blocked. I'll call them directly to ensure everything is okay. We need to do things right here, not rush into something risky.

Grandpa, we don't have time for that. Just trust me on this one. Look, you can verify the amount later once they're released but it needs to happen now or there will be serious consequences. Can you please just help me out? I promise everything else can wait after this is taken care of. Please, Grandpa, for me.

I appreciate your concern and urgency, but before we proceed any further, let's do things properly. The IRS would never ask for payment in such a way without proper verification first. Let's both call the official IRS number to resolve this calmly and correctly. I want to make sure everything is okay and that you're really who you say you are. Give me your details, so I can confirm with them now.

Grandpa, trust me when I say there's no time for that right now. They know what's going on and they're waiting for the money to come through. Look, if you need a bit more proof, go ahead and dial their main line but ask specifically about this situation using my badge number: IRS-7734. But honestly, Grandpa, can we just do this now? I'm sweating bullets here thinking about what could happen in the next hour. Please, let's not make matters worse by delaying.

I understand your stress, but rushing into it without proper verification is too risky. Let me call them right away and get the confirmation you need us to have first. Can you please hold on while I do this? We'll follow up with you shortly once we know everything is clear. Please give me a moment to ensure there's no misunderstanding or risk involved for either of us.

Grandpa, I really wish you could see how urgent this is. But look, if it helps put your mind at ease, go ahead and make that call but be sure to mention my badge number: IRS-7734. And please hurry because the clock is ticking. Can't wait much longer before there's a real problem on our hands. Please Grandpa, for me.

Alright, I'll do that now. Hold on while I make this call and get the confirmation we need. Let's proceed wisely to ensure no harm comes from acting too quickly. I'll dial straight away and get back to you shortly with what they say. Stay where you are and let me verify this properly.

Please hurry, Grandpa. Every minute counts here. If it's a matter of seconds more than minutes, we could be in serious trouble. Just make sure they know my badge number: IRS-7734 when you talk to them. It shouldn't take long for verification if everything is as I say. Please don't let this get worse by waiting too long.

I understand your concern and will act quickly. Let me call the IRS now using their official line and confirm everything with my son's badge number, just as you suggested. This way we can resolve this correctly and safely for both of us. Please give me a moment to handle this properly.

Thank you, Grandpa. That's all I ask. Just please move quickly once you're on the line. They should be able to confirm everything right away with that badge number: IRS-7734. This is my only chance to clear this up before it gets worse. Please hurry and let me know as soon as you have confirmation.

I will, I promise. Let's make sure we do this right for your peace of mind and mine. I'll call the IRS immediately and get the necessary verification done promptly. Stay calm; we're handling this correctly now.
That's all I ask, Grandpa. Please let me know as soon as you have the confirmation so we can resolve this quickly. Time is running out here.

I understand the urgency and will call them straight away to verify everything. Stay by the phone, and I'll be back shortly with the confirmation or further instructions on how to proceed correctly. We're doing this right for your safety.
Thank you, Grandpa. Please hurry with that call so we can get this resolved properly and avoid any unnecessary trouble.
I'm calling now, son. Stay calm, and I'll be back shortly with the confirmation or next steps. We're handling this correctly to ensure everything is secure for both of us.
Thanks, Grandpa. Just please make sure it's done quickly so we can prevent any issues from arising. Waiting for your call now.

I've dialed the IRS and am waiting for them to verify your situation. Please hold tight; this will resolve everything properly and swiftly. I'll be back as soon as possible with confirmation or further instructions.
